list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: focus one's attention or mental effort on a particular object or activity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she couldn't concentrate on the movie
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy không thể tập trung vào bộ phim

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: gather (people or things) together in numbers or in a mass.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: wealth was concentrated in the hands of the governing elite
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sự giàu có được tập trung trong tay ưu tú

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: increase the strength or proportion of (a substance or solution) by removing or reducing the water or any other diluting agent or by selective accumulation of atoms or molecules.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: plants and microorganisms can concentrate metals from the environment
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: thực vật và vi sinh vật có thể tập trung kim loại từ môi trường

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a substance made by removing water or other diluting agent; a concentrated form of something, especially food.
